subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded James Blake beat Paul Capdeville of Chile, 6-1, 6-4, to become the sixth American to reach the quarterfinals of the Delray Beach International in Florida. Blake joined third-seeded Sam Querrey, sixth-seeded Vince Spadea, eighth-seeded Mardy Fish, the wild-card entrant Robby Ginepri and Bobby Reynolds as second-round winners. The last time six Americans reached the quarterfinals at an ATP event was at Memphis in 2003.
